Summary: for the last two weeks. lights descending in our area.
divs: Sighting Detailsit looks like a star. it just keeps glowing and descending. its not a star but it glows brightly. it stays in the sky for hours. people who live here are scared to talk because we have a nuclear power plant here. its been going on 4 two weeks.
